title: Is support not building sight stone reportable?
body:
As the title says, do you think supports who don't build a sightstone {{item:2049}}  deserve to be reported automatically? 

I don't mean that they have to rush it or anything, but if the game's 40+ minutes and they don't have one, they may as well be trolling or assisting the enemy team IMO. Should the player ignore his teammates' pleas to pick one up, I figure you may as well add griefing to the list.

If it's a traditional support like Nami as opposed to something damage oriented like Brand, that goes double. (Though a Brand without one lategame still will get a report)

My own opinion is that it most certainly deserves a report, but I'm wondering what others think as well.
